title: Looters Strip Aid From About 100 Trucks in Gaza, U.N. Agency Says
content: UNRWA, the main U.N. agency aiding Palestinians, said its drivers were forced at gunpoint to unload supplies in what it called one of the worst such incidents of the war.
summary: UNRWA, the main U.N. agency aiding Palestinians, said its drivers were forced at gunpoint to unload supplies in what it called one of the worst such incidents of the war.

title: Israeli Strikes in Beirut’s Center Shatter a Tenuous Sense of Security
content: The strikes, the first in weeks inside Lebanon’s capital, forced residents to come to grips with another escalation of fighting between Israel and Hezbollah.
summary: The strikes, the first in weeks inside Lebanon’s capital, forced residents to come to grips with another escalation of fighting between Israel and Hezbollah.

title: Ukraine Is Poised to Strike Into Russia After Biden Approves Use of Long-Range Missiles
content: President Biden has granted permission for Kyiv to carry out long-range strikes, but looming over Ukraine’s newfound latitude is the ascent of President-elect Trump.
summary: President Biden has granted permission for Kyiv to carry out long-range strikes, but looming over Ukraine’s newfound latitude is the ascent of President-elect Trump.

title: Gisèle Pelicot’s Sons Tell of a ‘Devastated’ Family at Rape Trial in France
content: The men appeared in court, addressing their father, who admits to having drugged their mother over years and inviting dozens of men to rape her while she was unconscious.
summary: The men appeared in court, addressing their father, who admits to having drugged their mother over years and inviting dozens of men to rape her while she was unconscious.

title: As Trump Looms, Biden Makes a Twilight Pitch on Ukraine to Global Leaders
content: The president approved Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles inside Russia, but that decision, among others, may soon be reversed.
summary: The president approved Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles inside Russia, but that decision, among others, may soon be reversed.

title: Coffee, Juice, Shawarma: Tiny Traces of Normal Life in a Ruined Gaza
content: Most people in the enclave are struggling just to survive Israel’s assault on Hamas, and experts say famine is imminent. Yet a few pockets of ordinary life have bloomed in defiance of the war.
summary: Most people in the enclave are struggling just to survive Israel’s assault on Hamas, and experts say famine is imminent. Yet a few pockets of ordinary life have bloomed in defiance of the war.

title: Burglars Break Into Windsor Castle Estate, Home of Prince William, Kate and Family
content: The intruders entered a farm building on the castle estate last month and stole an Isuzu pickup and a quad bike, according to the local police.
summary: The intruders entered a farm building on the castle estate last month and stole an Isuzu pickup and a quad bike, according to the local police.

title: Venezuela Frees Over 130 People Imprisoned After Disputed Election
content: Experts say the release of some political prisoners may be an attempt by Venezuela’s autocrat to send a signal to President-elect Trump.
summary: Experts say the release of some political prisoners may be an attempt by Venezuela’s autocrat to send a signal to President-elect Trump.

title: Venezuela’s ‘Iron Lady’ Pleads With Trump to Save Her Country’s Democracy
content: In a series of rare in-depth interviews, Venezuela’s opposition leader called life in hiding “a difficult test” and asserted that Mr. Trump could gain an early “foreign policy victory” by pushing Nicolás Maduro from office.
summary: In a series of rare in-depth interviews, Venezuela’s opposition leader called life in hiding “a difficult test” and asserted that Mr. Trump could gain an early “foreign policy victory” by pushing Nicolás Maduro from office.

title: Alan Jones, Australian Former Radio Host, Arrested on Sexual Abuse Charges
content: The retired radio host, who was granted bail after being arrested, was accused of abusing eight victims over nearly 20 years.
summary: The retired radio host, who was granted bail after being arrested, was accused of abusing eight victims over nearly 20 years.

title: On Migration, Europe Warms to Ideas Once Seen as Fringe
content: As in the United States, a decline in the numbers of migrants crossing borders has not stopped anti-migrant sentiments from gaining ground.

title: Biden Allows Ukraine to Strike Russia With Long-Range U.S. Missiles
